title: IFillPatternFeatureData.FeatureScope
description: Gets or sets whether to use scope for this fill pattern feature in a multibody part.
returns: True if only specified bodies in a multibody part are affected by the fill pattern feature; false if all the bodies are affected
remarks:
This property is valid only if
IFillPatternFeatureData::GeometryPattern
is true.
If this property is true, you can use
IFillPatternFeatureData::AutoSelect
and
IFillPatternFeatureData::FeatureScopeBodies
to specify affected bodies.
For more information, see the
Fill
Pattern PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
